page.title: 02The Old School, Henstead
page.content: This former state primary school is now a private co-educational preparatory school catering for approximately 100 children between the ages of 5 - 13 years. With one or two exceptions the pupils do not live in the locla area but are transported by private means. Most travel 8-15km into school with maximum distances up to 25 km. The towns of Beccles, Oulton Broad, Lowestoft and Southwold are the main catchment centres. The teaching staff live outside the area but the caretaker lives locally.
